document_data.refs2e: While not normally possible in 2 edition rules, Eler was both a thief and a berserker.
document_data.mainbody:
Eler Had was a Bhaalspawn who joined the forces of Gromnir Il-Khan during the Bhaalspawn crisis of Tethyr in the midâ€“14 century DR.
He wore the powerful grandmasters armor once worn by the great assassin Vita Muerte.
When Saradush was under siege by Yaga-Shura in the , Eler remained with Gromnir Il-Khan while his forces barricaded themselves within the citys castle. He fought in Gromnirs last stand against their fellow Bhaalspawn Abdel Adrian, and his adventuring companions.
